title: Millions Of Cubans Still Without Power After 3rd Grid Failure
content: Millions of Cubans awoke on Sunday to find their homes still without power after another partial grid failure overnight, deepening a crisis that has raised questions over the viability of the government's efforts to reestablish electrical service.
summary: Millions of Cubans awoke on Sunday to find their homes still without power after another partial grid failure overnight, deepening a crisis that has raised questions over the viability of the government's efforts to reestablish electrical service.

title: UK To Address Backlog Of Modern Slavery Cases Amid 50 Million Trapped
content: The UK Government has announced the recruitment of 200 additional Home Office staff to address a backlog of 23,300 modern slavery cases inherited from the previous administration.
summary: The UK Government has announced the recruitment of 200 additional Home Office staff to address a backlog of 23,300 modern slavery cases inherited from the previous administration.

title: "Maggots, Slime, And Disease": World's Dirtiest Ships Named And Shamed
content: The Center for Disease Control (CDC) has revealed the top 10 filthiest cruise ships of 2024 after health officials randomly inspected 114 different ships.
summary: The Center for Disease Control (CDC) has revealed the top 10 filthiest cruise ships of 2024 after health officials randomly inspected 114 different ships.

title: From Comedian To President Of Ukraine: All About Volodymyr Zelenskyy
content: Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelenskyy is actively seeking support from Western allies for his "Victory Plan," which aims to end the ongoing war with Russia.
summary: Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelenskyy is actively seeking support from Western allies for his "Victory Plan," which aims to end the ongoing war with Russia.

title: Video: Indian-Origin Man Faces Hate In Canada, Told To 'Return To India'
content: Mr Annamalai expressed concerns about rising hate crimes against the Indian community, he also cited a report showing that the Waterloo region has the highest rate of police-reported hate crimes in Canada.
summary: Mr Annamalai expressed concerns about rising hate crimes against the Indian community, he also cited a report showing that the Waterloo region has the highest rate of police-reported hate crimes in Canada.

title: On Harris's 60th Birthday, Trump To Visit McDonald's Store To Mock Her
content: Kamala Harris says she worked at a McDonald's when she was young but Donald Trump says he does not believe her.
summary: Kamala Harris says she worked at a McDonald's when she was young but Donald Trump says he does not believe her.

title: Israel Hits Hezbollah Intelligence HQ After Drone Launched At Netanyahu Home
content: The strikes on Hezbollah's south Beirut stronghold came after Benjamin Netanyahu accused the Iran-backed group of attempting to assassinate him by targeting his residence.
summary: The strikes on Hezbollah's south Beirut stronghold came after Benjamin Netanyahu accused the Iran-backed group of attempting to assassinate him by targeting his residence.

title: Ex Indian Spy, Wanted By FBI, Dismisses Terrorist Murder Plot Charge
content: The US Department of Justice charged Vikash Yadav with leading an unsuccessful plot to murder Khalistani terrorist Gurpatwant Singh Pannun last year.
summary: The US Department of Justice charged Vikash Yadav with leading an unsuccessful plot to murder Khalistani terrorist Gurpatwant Singh Pannun last year.

title: At This Airport, Goodbye Hugs Have A 'Time Limit'. CEO Explains Why
content: A New Zealand airport has stirred up a debate with its new policy aimed at reducing long farewells in the drop-off area.
summary: A New Zealand airport has stirred up a debate with its new policy aimed at reducing long farewells in the drop-off area.

title: Opinion: Israel Has Little Reason To End Its War On Gaza - Even With Yahya Sinwar Dead
content: With US elections just weeks away, Israeli PM Netanyahu understands that he would likely get a free pass, whether Trump becomes President or Kamala Harris.
summary: With US elections just weeks away, Israeli PM Netanyahu understands that he would likely get a free pass, whether Trump becomes President or Kamala Harris.

title: "You Would Be Worried If...": Barack Obama's 'Grandpa' Jibe At Donald Trump
content: Addressing a public rally to build support for Democrat Presidential candidate Kamala Harris and her running mate Tim Walz, former US President Barack Obama today blasted Donald Trump, saying that the Republican candidate cares only about his ego
summary: Addressing a public rally to build support for Democrat Presidential candidate Kamala Harris and her running mate Tim Walz, former US President Barack Obama today blasted Donald Trump, saying that the Republican candidate cares only about his ego

title: Rare US Constitution Copy From 1787 Fetches Over $11 Million At Auction
content: A rare copy of the United States Constitution, printed after the 1787 Constitutional Convention, has sold for more than $11 million during a live auction in Asheville, North Carolina, on Thursday evening.
summary: A rare copy of the United States Constitution, printed after the 1787 Constitutional Convention, has sold for more than $11 million during a live auction in Asheville, North Carolina, on Thursday evening.

title: Kamala Harris Turns 60 As Age Plays Key Role In US Election
content: Age has been a crucial factor in a campaign that Joe Biden quit over fears about his capacity, and where Kamala Harris has steadily taken aim at Donald Trump's mental fitness for office.
summary: Age has been a crucial factor in a campaign that Joe Biden quit over fears about his capacity, and where Kamala Harris has steadily taken aim at Donald Trump's mental fitness for office.

title: Indian Passport Holders Can Now Avail Visa-On-Arrival In UAE
content: To qualify for the visa-on-arrival, passports must be valid for at least six months from the date of entry into the UAE
summary: To qualify for the visa-on-arrival, passports must be valid for at least six months from the date of entry into the UAE

title: 'Forever Chemicals' Found In Bottled And Tap Water Across UK and China
content: 'Forever Chemicals', known as perfluoroalkyl substances are long-lasting chemicals that break down extremely slowly over time.
summary: 'Forever Chemicals', known as perfluoroalkyl substances are long-lasting chemicals that break down extremely slowly over time.

title: Elon Musk To Award $1 Million Each Day To A Signer Of His Petition
content: Elon Musk awarded a $1 million check to an attendee of his event in Pennsylvania aimed at rallying supporters behind Republican Donald Trump.
summary: Elon Musk awarded a $1 million check to an attendee of his event in Pennsylvania aimed at rallying supporters behind Republican Donald Trump.

title: Video: North Korean Soldiers At Russian Training Ground Amid Ukraine War
content: North Korea has deployed 1,500 soldiers to Russia for military training, with plans to send up to 12,000 troops to fight in the Ukraine war, South Korea's National Intelligence Service (NIS) has confirmed.
summary: North Korea has deployed 1,500 soldiers to Russia for military training, with plans to send up to 12,000 troops to fight in the Ukraine war, South Korea's National Intelligence Service (NIS) has confirmed.

title: Boss Fires Woman After She Comes Back From Maternity Leave Pregnant Again
content: Nikita Twitchen, a former admin assistant at First Grade Projects, launched an unfair dismissal claim, alleging her pregnancy was the reason for her termination.
summary: Nikita Twitchen, a former admin assistant at First Grade Projects, launched an unfair dismissal claim, alleging her pregnancy was the reason for her termination.

title: "Had Weird Taste": Woman Freed From ISIS Reveals They Made Them Eat Babies
content: Fawzia Sido recounted how, at the age of nine, she was captured along with her brothers and starved for three days. She was rescued by Israel from Gaza earlier this month.
summary: Fawzia Sido recounted how, at the age of nine, she was captured along with her brothers and starved for three days. She was rescued by Israel from Gaza earlier this month.

title: A Ukraine Drone Hovered Over Russian Troops. Then A Rocket Rained Fire
content: A drone this week helped Ukrainian troops attack a military training facility of Russian troops in Zaporizhzhia Oblast in Russian-occupied southern Ukraine.
summary: A drone this week helped Ukrainian troops attack a military training facility of Russian troops in Zaporizhzhia Oblast in Russian-occupied southern Ukraine.
